mapper.sql: dict_id, dict_key, dict_k_description, dict_value, dict_v_description, dict_sort, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_dictionary (dict_id, dict_key, dict_k_description, dict_value, dict_v_description, dict_sort, create_time) values (#{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictKDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictVDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_dictionary
dict_id,
dict_key,
dict_k_description,
dict_value,
dict_v_description,
dict_sort,
create_time,

mapper.update:
update t_dictionary
dict_key = #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_k_description = #{dictKDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_v_description = #{dictVDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_sort = #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_dictionary set dict_key = #{dictKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_k_description = #{dictKDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_v_description = #{dictVDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_sort = #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from t_dictionary where 1=1
and dict_k_description like concat(concat('%',#{dictKDescription}),'%')
and dict_v_description like concat(concat('%',#{dictVDescription}),'%')
order by dict_key,dict_sort

select count(1) from t_dictionary where 1=1
and dict_k_description like concat(concat('%',#{dictKDescription}),'%')
and dict_v_description like concat(concat('%',#{dictVDescription}),'%')
